quote: Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles. – Steve Jobs
fact: Arnold Schonberg suffered from triskaidecaphobia, the fear of the number 13.  He died at 13 minutes from midnight on Friday the 13th.
joke: What did the doctor say to the gingerbread man who broke his leg? Try icing it.
